attributes.action: listen re rising costs or  risk a general strike
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people of this country can no longer substain all of this goverments  stealth taxes   , we must act  before we are priced out of this country , homes,repossesed , jobs lost old people hungry people cold,  wake up  the uk ,let the people actgive this goverment a wake up call , look at your european neighbours they will not tolerate what the uk tolerates come on we all must unite and stop this goverment from taking us back to the dark days

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
